narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sarah Care USA is a Nursing Care provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $72.8M in Medicaid payments across 531K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $72.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
